languages.text: {n}Мстительно улыбаясь, Джай заявляет ему вслед:{/n} "Кто вообще поверит человеку, выливающему на себя унции духов, чтобы скрыть запах своего тела? Всякому известно, что это — верный признак склонной к обману души!"

{n}With a vicious smile, Jae remarks in his wake,{/n} "Who would ever trust the word of a man who douses himself in perfume to cover up his body odour? Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of a soul prone to deceit!"
languages.original_text: {n}Мстительно улыбаясь, Джай заявляет ему вслед:{/n} "Кто вообще поверит человеку, выливающему на себя унции духов, чтобы скрыть запах своего тела? Всякому известно, что это — верный признак склонной к обману души!"

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊在他身后露出了恶意的笑容。{/n}“那些用香水掩盖体臭的人，他们的话有谁会相信呢？每个人都知道，这样的人最擅长欺骗他人！”
languages.original_text: {n}With a vicious smile, Jae remarks in his wake,{/n} "Who would ever trust the word of a man who douses himself in perfume to cover up his body odour? Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of a soul prone to deceit!"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊在他身后露出了恶意的笑容。{/n}“那些用香水掩盖体臭的人，他们的话有谁会相信呢？每个人都知道，这样的人最擅长欺骗他人！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}意地悪な笑みを浮かべ、ジェイはダンロックを見送りながら話す{/n}「体臭を隠すために香水をつけるような男の言葉を、誰が信用すると思ったんだろうね？それが欺瞞に満ちた魂の灯であることは、誰だって知ってるのにさ！」
languages.original_text: {n}With a vicious smile, Jae remarks in his wake,{/n} "Who would ever trust the word of a man who douses himself in perfume to cover up his body odour? Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of a soul prone to deceit!"

traits.locale_text: {n}意地悪な笑みを浮かべ、ジェイはダンロックを見送りながら話す{/n}「体臭を隠すために香水をつけるような男の言葉を、誰が信用すると思ったんだろうね？それが欺瞞に満ちた魂の灯であることは、誰だって知ってるのにさ！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Con una sonrisa sádica, Jae comenta a sus espaldas:{/n} «¿Quién iba a confiar en un hombre que se cubre de perfume para tapar su propio olor? ¡Todo el mundo sabe que es una señal clara de un alma engañosa!».
languages.original_text: {n}With a vicious smile, Jae remarks in his wake,{/n} "Who would ever trust the word of a man who douses himself in perfume to cover up his body odour? Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of a soul prone to deceit!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una sonrisa sádica, Jae comenta a sus espaldas:{/n} «¿Quién iba a confiar en un hombre que se cubre de perfume para tapar su propio olor? ¡Todo el mundo sabe que es una señal clara de un alma engañosa!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec un sourire cruel, Jae remarque dans son dos :{/n} « Qui aurait l'idée de faire confiance à un homme qui s'inonde de parfum pour masquer l'odeur de sa transpiration ? Tout le monde sait qu'il faut y voir le signe d'une âme encline à la tromperie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}With a vicious smile, Jae remarks in his wake,{/n} "Who would ever trust the word of a man who douses himself in perfume to cover up his body odour? Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of a soul prone to deceit!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sourire cruel, Jae remarque dans son dos :{/n} « Qui aurait l'idée de faire confiance à un homme qui s'inonde de parfum pour masquer l'odeur de sa transpiration ? Tout le monde sait qu'il faut y voir le signe d'une âme encline à la tromperie ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae lächelt böse und schickt ihm hinterher:{/n} "Wer kann schon dem Wort eines Mannes trauen, der sich extrem einparfümiert, nur um seinen Körpergeruch zu übertünchen? Dabei weiß doch jeder, dass so etwas nur jemand mit betrügerischer Seele macht!"
languages.original_text: {n}With a vicious smile, Jae remarks in his wake,{/n} "Who would ever trust the word of a man who douses himself in perfume to cover up his body odour? Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of a soul prone to deceit!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae lächelt böse und schickt ihm hinterher:{/n} "Wer kann schon dem Wort eines Mannes trauen, der sich extrem einparfümiert, nur um seinen Körpergeruch zu übertünchen? Dabei weiß doch jeder, dass so etwas nur jemand mit betrügerischer Seele macht!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, haince bir gülümsemeyle arkasından konuşuyor.{/n} "Kokusunu gizlemek için üstüne parfüm boca eden bir adamın sözüne kim inanır ki zaten? Bunun, aldatmacaya meyilli bir ruhun kesin göstergesi olduğunu herkes bilir!"
languages.original_text: {n}With a vicious smile, Jae remarks in his wake,{/n} "Who would ever trust the word of a man who douses himself in perfume to cover up his body odour? Everyone knows that that is a sure sign of a soul prone to deceit!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae haince bir gülümsemeyle arkasından konuşuyor.{/n} "Vücut kokusunu kapatmak için üstüne parfüm boca eden bir adamın sözüne kim inanır ki zaten? Bunun aldatmacaya meyilli bir ruhun kesin göstergesi olduğunu herkes bilir!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
